00400    /* 
00401    * Shift Vector r to periodic cell, R[axis] < r[axis] < maxima_[axis].
00402    */
00403    inline void MonoclinicBoundary::shift(Vector& r) const
00404    {
00405        if(r[0] >= maxima_[0]) {
00406           r[0] -= l_[0];
00407           assert(r[0] < maxima_[0]);
00408        } else
00409        if (r[0] <  minima_[0]) {
00410           r[0] += l_[0];
00411           assert(r[0] >= minima_[0]);
00412        }
00413        if(r[1] >= maxima_[1]) {
00414           r[1] -= l_[1];
00415           r[2] -= d_;
00416           assert(r[1] < l_[1]);
00417        } else
00418        if (r[1] <  minima_[1]) {
00419           r[1] += l_[1];
00420           r[2] += d_;
00421           assert(r[1] >= minima_[1]);
00422        }
00423        double u2 = r[2] + c3_*r[1];
00424        if(u2 >= maxima_[2]) {
00425           r[2] -= l_[2];
00426           assert(r[2] + c3_*r[1] >= minima_[2]);
00427        } else
00428        if (u2 <  minima_[2]) {
00429           r[2] += l_[2];
00430           assert(r[2] + c3_*r[1] >= minima_[2]);
00431        }
00432    }
00433 
00434    /* 
00435    * Shift Vector r to periodic cell, R[axis] < r[axis] < maxima_[axis].
00436    */
00437    inline void MonoclinicBoundary::shift(Vector& r, IntVector& shift) const
00438    {
00439        if (r[0] >= maxima_[0]) {
00440           r[0] -= l_[0];
00441           ++(shift[0]);
00442           assert(r[0] < maxima_[0]);
00443        } else
00444        if (r[0] <  minima_[0]) {
00445           r[0] += l_[0];
00446           --(shift[0]);
00447           assert(r[0] >= minima_[0]);
00448        }
00449        if (r[1] >= maxima_[1]) {
00450           r[1] -= l_[1];
00451           r[2] -= d_;
00452           ++(shift[1]);
00453           assert(r[1] < l_[1]);
00454        } else
00455        if (r[1] <  minima_[1]) {
00456           r[1] += l_[1];
00457           r[2] += d_;
00458           --(shift[1]);
00459           assert(r[1] >= minima_[1]);
00460        }
00461        double u2 = r[2] + c3_*r[1];
00462        if (u2 >= maxima_[2]) {
00463           r[2] -= l_[2];
00464           ++(shift[2]);
00465           assert(r[2] + c3_*r[1] < maxima_[2]);
00466        } else
00467        if (u2 <  minima_[2]) {
00468           r[2] += l_[2];
00469           --(shift[2]);
00470           assert(r[2] + c3_*r[1] >= minima_[2]);
00471        }
00472    }
00473 
00474    /*
00475    * Shift Cartesian Vector r by multiple t of a Bravais lattice vector.
00476    */
00477    inline void MonoclinicBoundary::applyShift(Vector &r, int i, int t) const
00478    { 
00479       switch (i) {
00480       case 0: 
00481          r[0] += t*l_[0];
00482          break;
00483       case 1: 
00484          r[1] += t*l_[1];
00485          r[2] += t*d_;
00486          break;
00487       case 2: 
00488          r[2] += t*l_[2];
00489          break;
00490       }
00491    }
00492    
00493    /* 
00494    * Shift generalized Vector r to primitive unit cell.
00495    */
00496    inline void MonoclinicBoundary::shiftGen(Vector& r) const
00497    {
00498       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00499          if( r[i] >= 1.0 ) {
00500             r[i] = r[i] - 1.0;
00501             assert(r[i] < 1.0);
00502          } else
00503          if ( r[i] <  0.0 ) {
00504             r[i] = r[i] + 1.0;
00505             assert(r[i] >= 0.0);
00506          }
00507       }
00508    }
00509 
00510    /* 
00511    * Shift generalized Vector r to primitive cell, 0 < r[axis] < 1.0.
00512    */
00513    inline 
00514    void MonoclinicBoundary::shiftGen(Vector& r, IntVector& shift) const
00515    {
00516       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00517          if (r[i] >= 1.0) {
00518             r[i] = r[i] - 1.0;
00519             ++(shift[i]);
00520             assert(r[i] < 1.0);
00521          } else
00522          if (r[i] <  0.0) {
00523             r[i] = r[i] + 1.0;
00524             --(shift[i]);
00525             assert(r[i] >= 0.0);
00526          }
00527       }
00528    }
00529 
00530    /* 
00531    * Calculate minimum-image squared distance.
00532    */
00533    inline 
00534    double MonoclinicBoundary::distanceSq(const Vector &r1, const Vector &r2, 
00535                                          IntVector& translate) const
00536    {
00537 
00538       double dx = r1[0] - r2[0];
00539       if ( fabs(dx) > halfL_[0] ) {
00540          if (dx > 0.0) {
00541             dx -= l_[0];
00542             translate[0] = -1;
00543          } else {
00544             dx += l_[0];
00545             translate[0] = +1;
00546          }
00547          assert(fabs(dx) <= halfL_[0]);
00548       } else {
00549          translate[0] = 0;
00550       }
00551 
00552       double dy = r1[1] - r2[1];
00553       double dz = r1[2] - r2[2];
00554       double u2 = dz + c3_*dy;
00555       if ( fabs(dy) > halfL_[1] ) {
00556          if (dy > 0.0) {
00557             dy -= l_[1];
00558             dz -= d_;
00559             translate[1] = -1;
00560          } else {
00561             dy += l_[1];
00562             dz += d_;
00563             translate[1] = +1;
00564          }
00565          assert(fabs(dy) <= halfL_[1]);
00566       } else {
00567          translate[1] = 0;
00568       }
00569 
00570       if ( fabs(u2) >  halfL_[2]) {
00571          if (u2 > 0.0) {
00572             dz -= l_[2];
00573             translate[2] = -1;
00574          } else {
00575             dz += l_[2];
00576             translate[2] = +1;
00577          }
00578          assert(fabs(dz + c3_*dy) <= halfL_[2]);
00579       } else {
00580          translate[2] = 0;
00581       }
00582       return dx*dx+dy*dy+dz*dz;
00583    }
00584 
00585    /* 
00586    * Compute minimum image squared distance and separation.
00587    */
00588    inline 
00589    double MonoclinicBoundary::distanceSq(const Vector &r1, 
00590                                          const Vector &r2) const
00591    {
00592 
00593       double dx = r1[0] - r2[0];
00594       if ( fabs(dx) > halfL_[0] ) {
00595          if (dx > 0.0) {
00596             dx -= l_[0];
00597          } else {
00598             dx += l_[0];
00599          }
00600          assert(fabs(dx) <= halfL_[0]);
00601       }
00602 
00603       double dy = r1[1] - r2[1];
00604       double dz = r1[2] - r2[2];
00605       double u2 = dz + c3_*dy;
00606       if ( fabs(dy) > halfL_[1] ) {
00607          if (dy > 0.0) {
00608             dy -= l_[1];
00609             dz -= d_;
00610          } else {
00611             dy += l_[1];
00612             dz += d_;
00613          }
00614          assert(fabs(dy) <= halfL_[1]);
00615       }
00616 
00617       if ( fabs(u2) >  halfL_[2]) {
00618          if (u2 > 0.0) {
00619             dz -= l_[2];
00620          } else {
00621             dz += l_[2];
00622          }
00623          assert(fabs(dz+c3_*dy) <= halfL_[2]);
00624       }
00625 
00626       return dx*dx+dy*dy+dz*dz;
00627    }
00628 
00629    /* 
00630    * Calculate squared distance and separation vector by mininum convention.
00631    */
00632    inline 
00633    double MonoclinicBoundary::distanceSq(const Vector &r1, const Vector &r2, 
00634                                          Vector &dr) const
00635    {
00636 
00637       double dx = r1[0] - r2[0];
00638       if (fabs(dx) > halfL_[0]) {
00639          if (dx > 0.0) {
00640             dx -= l_[0];
00641          } else {
00642             dx += l_[0];
00643          }
00644          assert(fabs(dx) <= halfL_[0]);
00645       }
00646 
00647       double dy = r1[1] - r2[1];
00648       double dz = r1[2] - r2[2];
00649       double u2 = dz + c3_*dy;
00650 
00651       if (fabs(dy) > halfL_[1]) {
00652          if (dy > 0.0) {
00653             dy -= l_[1];
00654             dz -= d_;
00655          } else {
00656             dy += l_[1];
00657             dz += d_;
00658          }
00659          assert(fabs(dy) <= halfL_[1]);
00660       }
00661 
00662       if (fabs(u2) >  halfL_[2]) {
00663          if (u2 > 0.0) {
00664             dz -= l_[2];
00665          } else {
00666        dz += l_[2];
00667          }
00668          assert(fabs(dz+c3_*dy) <= halfL_[2]);
00669       }
00670 
00671       dr[0] = dx;
00672       dr[1] = dy;
00673       dr[2] = dz;
00674 
00675       return (dx*dx + dy*dy + dz*dz);
00676    }

00700    inline LatticeSystem MonoclinicBoundary::latticeSystem()
00701    { return lattice_; }
00702 
00706    inline 
00707    void MonoclinicBoundary::transformCartToGen(const Vector& Rc, Vector& Rg) 
00708    const
00709    {
00710       Rg[0] = Rc[0] * invL_[0];
00711       Rg[1] = Rc[1] * invL_[1];
00712       Rg[2] = (Rc[2] + c3_ *Rc[1]) * invL_[2];
00713    }
00714       
00718    inline 
00719    void MonoclinicBoundary::transformGenToCart(const Vector& Rg, Vector& Rc) 
00720    const
00721    {
00722       Rc[0] = Rg[0]*l_[0];
00723       Rc[1] = Rg[1]*l_[1];
00724       Rc[2] = Rg[2]*l_[2] + Rg[1]*d_;
00725    }
